title: Japan's Nikkei logs worst day since 1987 Black Monday crash
content: The 12.4% loss on the Nikkei was the worst day for the index since the "Black Monday" of 1987.
summary: The 12.4% loss on the Nikkei was the worst day for the index since the "Black Monday" of 1987.

title: European markets plunge 2.6% as global volatility deepens; oil and gas stocks shed 3.9%
content: European stocks fell sharply at the start of trade Monday as global volatility continues.
summary: European stocks fell sharply at the start of trade Monday as global volatility continues.

title: Ukraine finally sends F-16s into the battle against Russia — but they might not be a game-changer
content: It was a pivotal moment for Ukraine as it unveiled its first F-16 fighter jets on Sunday. The difference the aircraft will make in battle remains to be seen.
summary: It was a pivotal moment for Ukraine as it unveiled its first F-16 fighter jets on Sunday. The difference the aircraft will make in battle remains to be seen.

title: Crypto selloff wipes out $270 billion in value as bitcoin, ether plunge
content: Bitcoin and ethereum suffered steep drops on Sunday as investors sold out of risky assets.
summary: Bitcoin and ethereum suffered steep drops on Sunday as investors sold out of risky assets.

title: A global stock rout is deepening with investors fleeing to safe havens
content: Investors are turning to safe haven assets like the U.S. Treasurys and Swiss franc, as the global stocks sell-off deepens.
summary: Investors are turning to safe haven assets like the U.S. Treasurys and Swiss franc, as the global stocks sell-off deepens.

title: UBS says 'going into Japan now is like catching a falling knife,' warns stock sell-off will continue

summary: The Nikkei 225 and the Topix extended their declines, falling past 7% on the day, and hovering close to bear market territory.

title: U.S. expat who's lived in Italy, France and more: If you want to move to Europe, here's my best advice

title: 'Never quit your job,' says early retiree and self-made multimillionaire: Do this instead
content: Financial Samurai founder Sam Dogen says you're better off financially negotiating a layoff rather than quitting if you're unhappy at work.
summary: Financial Samurai founder Sam Dogen says you're better off financially negotiating a layoff rather than quitting if you're unhappy at work.

title: Taiwan under pressure to bolster its defense as Trump-Harris presidential race stokes policy concerns
content: Experts say that Taiwan is under more pressure to build up its defense capabilities and deterrence in the face of uncertainty in the upcoming U.S. elections.

title: No passports needed: Singapore launches biometric immigration processing at Changi Airport
content: Singapore launches trials for travelers to clear immigration at Changi Airport using biometric data in lieu of passport checks.
summary: Singapore launches trials for travelers to clear immigration at Changi Airport using biometric data in lieu of passport checks.

title: Retiring Corvette 'godfather' on EVs, spinoff and a performance SUV
content: The "godfather" of GM's modern day Corvettes Tadge Juechter retired Wednesday after roughly 47 years with the automaker, including 31 years devoted to Corvette.
summary: The "godfather" of GM's modern day Corvettes Tadge Juechter retired Wednesday after roughly 47 years with the automaker, including 31 years devoted to Corvette.

title: 'Underconsumption core' is in — and not a moment too soon, I say
content: Underconsumption is not just a fad, it’s a movement that often goes hand in hand with the start of a economic slowdown.

title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway sold nearly half its stake in Apple
content: Berkshire disclosed an $84.2 billion stake in Apple at the end of the second quarter, suggesting that Buffett offloaded more than 49% of the tech stake.

title: 'I love my black job': Simone Biles takes apparent swipe at Trump after winning Olympics gold
content: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump says immigrants are "taking Black jobs."

title: Age is just a number for this 36-year-old academic who has danced her way to the Olympics

title: Singapore's monetary authority sets up review group in bid to revive its equities market
content: MAS said one goal will be to identify methods for encouraging participation, including from capital market intermediaries, investors and listed companies.

title: Japan's stock rout shows a 'fundamental shift' is underway, Goldman Sachs' equity strategist says

title: China’s first university degree in marriage offers courses like matchmaking and pre-divorce counseling
content: Modules will include sociology, wedding venue design, family ethics, the economics of the marriage industry and family policies.

title: Warren Buffett raises Berkshire cash level to record $277 billion after slashing stock holdings

title: UK lenders slash mortgages as Bank of England rate cut brings relief to homeowners
